name: Learning to Spell
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

Improve your child's spelling and alphabet's skills with Learning to Spell

  • Over 300 words for your child to master
  • Mini-games which develop skills in spelling, handwriting and reading
  • Sticker-book reward feature designed to encourage your child to keep on learning
  • Puppy companion that encourages and guides your child through the games

shot.caption: I did it Mum! Spelling title screen
